amendment.description: To require a report on circumstances in which the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services may be providing Medicare or Medicaid payments to, or otherwise funding, entities that process genome or exome data in the People's Republic of China or the Russian Federation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3998 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3998 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Rubio to Amendment SA 3695.
